title: Ticket #3384: Verify HTCondor-CE functionality
description:
Verify that HTCondor components of HTCondor-CE setup work as needed. Of particular interest are job proxy handling by HTCondor-C, job router, and blahp, and job lease handling by HTCondor-C. These features should be tested in an environment that resembles the HTCondor-CE setup as closely as possible. This includes a multi-user, root-based installation with HTCondor-C, job router, and blahp all chained together.

Where appropriate and feasible, regression tests should be written for critical pieces of functionality.
